attributes.action: Accept that 17.2 mil Brexit voters knew it meant out of the EU and single market
attributes.background:
Members of parliament are trying to delay Brexit by wanting a second referendum on what the Exit deal is, stating we didn't understand what it meant.
Please let these politicians know we knew exactly what it meant, out means, out of the EU and Out of the single market. No dilution of this needed

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
